      • makeAsDeletedMessage

        public void makeAsDeletedMessage(int id)
        This method not delete message, but if apply one to message id, this message doesn't send to your subscribers.
        Parameters:

      • getStoredMessageObservable

        public rx.Observable<java.util.List<BoxAppMessageModel>> getStoredMessageObservable()
        This observable for subscribe on message storage changes. You can manually call update data on this observable, just call notifyStorageSubscribers() from your code. This method don't coll onComplete signature!!!
        Returns:
        Observable for your subscribers.

      • checkNewViberMessagesFromCloud

        public rx.Observable<java.util.List<BoxAppMessageModel>> checkNewViberMessagesFromCloud()
        This method send request to GMS Worldwide server for check new Viber messages for current user. This method work if your plan include this function! If you retrieve Viber messages on previous day, you can't send second request for one day!.
        Returns:
        Observable for your subscribers.
